title: Unable to connect to PVP.Net
body: I couldnt' connect to the OCE server, however I still can connect to the NA one. How to solve this? And what happaned to me :(

replies.body:
Can you connect to OCE now? Riot were having some server issues and you may have been affected by that.

Otherwise, have you tried changing your DNS? I hear that some company provided DNSes can't find Riot's OCE servers correctly.
